static bool ApplicationLogic.Model.StockItem.IsValidStockCode ( string  value ) [static]

Checks if the stock code conforms to a certain format. Current format is exactly four numbers, with leading 0 allowed.

Parameters:
valueThe string that must be checked against the schema.
Returns:
True if the string conforms to the schema, false otherwise.
